00010 #ifndef _ADF_DEFS_H
00011 #define _ADF_DEFS_H 1
00012 
00013 #define ADFLIB_VERSION "0.7.9c"
00014 #define ADFLIB_DATE "16 October, 2002"
00015 
00016 #define SECTNUM long
00017 #define RETCODE long
00018 
00019 #define TRUE    1
00020 #define FALSE   0
00021 
00022 #define ULONG   unsigned long
00023 #define USHORT  unsigned short
00024 #define UCHAR   unsigned char
00025 #define BOOL    int
00026 
00027 
00028 /* defines max and min */
00029 
00030 #ifndef max
00031 #define max(a,b)        (a)>(b) ? (a) : (b)
00032 #endif
00033 #ifndef min
00034 #define min(a,b)        (a)<(b) ? (a) : (b)
00035 #endif
00036 
00037 
00038 /* (*byte) to (*short) and (*byte) to (*long) conversion */
00039 
00040 #define Short(p) ((p)[0]<<8 | (p)[1])
00041 #define Long(p) (Short(p)<<16 | Short(p+2))
00042 
00043 
00044 /* swap short and swap long macros for little endian machines */
00045 
00046 #define swapShort(p) ((p)[0]<<8 | (p)[1])
00047 #define swapLong(p) (swapShort(p)<<16 | swapShort(p+2))
00048 
00049 
00050 
00051 #endif /* _ADF_DEFS_H */
